    editOrDeleteEnquiry() - Method in class Interface.ApplicantInterface
    Allows the applicant to edit or delete previously submitted enquiries, provided they have not yet been responded to by officers.
    editOrDeleteEnquiry() - Method in class Interface.OfficerInterface
    Displays the officer's past enquiries and allows editing or deletion if the enquiry has not been responded to yet.
    editOrDeleteProject() - Method in class Interface.ManagerInterface
    Allows the manager to edit attributes of or delete an existing project after verifying authorization and project existence.
    editProject(int, Project) - Method in interface Service.IManagerService
    Edits the specified project based on a provided option.
    editProject(int, Project) - Method in class Service.ManagerService
    Edits a project based on user input and a specified field to modify.
